description: Claude Code settings for ms-dynamics project

hooks.command: python3 -c "import json,sys; d=json.load(sys.stdin); p=d.get('tool_input',{}).get('file_path',''); blocked=['.env','.env.local','secrets','.git/config','id_rsa','credentials']; sys.exit(2) if any(b in p for b in blocked) else sys.exit(0)"
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | { read f; [[ -n "$f" && "$f" == *.ts ]] && npx prettier --write "$f" 2>/dev/null || true; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | { read f; [[ -n "$f" && "$f" == *.tsx ]] && npx prettier --write "$f" 2>/dev/null || true; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | { read f; [[ -n "$f" && "$f" == *.py ]] && command -v black >/dev/null && black --quiet "$f" 2>/dev/null || true; }
